name: StarkDeFi
introduce: StarkDeFi is a StarkNet-based DeFi Hub that aims to increase the adoption of blockchain technology using ZK-Rollup technology. The protocol facilitates and simplifies the onboarding process for "next-gen users" in the blockchain space through a hub that can accommodate a variety of DeFi solutions. StarkDeFi products include DEX, Yield Farm, NFT minting platform, staking pool, Launchpad, etc.
